00019 bool GameLogic::step()
00020 {
00021         
00022         ws->deleteQueued(); // Delete all the things that were destroyed last frame now, since it won't interfere with iterators, etc.
00023         unsigned int currentTime = CL_System::get_time(); //Since the framerate might not be steady, need to see how much actual time has gone by
00024         ws->timeElapsed = currentTime - ws->time;
00025         ws->time = currentTime;
00026 
00027         //should handle input with event callbacks, but I can't get them to work
00028         handleInput();
00029         
00030         const GameObjectList* objects = ws->getAllGameObjects();
00031         ConstGameObjectIter itr;
00032         for(itr = objects->begin();itr !=objects->end();)
00033         {
00034 #ifdef PHYSICS
00035                 (*itr)->processMovementPhysics();
00036 #endif
00037                 (*itr)->age += ws->timeElapsed;
00038                 (*itr++)->doActions();
00039         }
00040 
00041         return true;
00042 }

00044 void GameLogic::handleInput()
00045 {
00046         static int timeLastFired;
00047          if (keyboard->get_keycode(CL_KEY_SPACE))
00048          {
00049                  
00050                  if (ws->time - timeLastFired > 100)
00051                  {
00052                          Projectile* p = new Projectile();
00053                          p->setSprite("Ammo\\test");
00054                         p->displayHeading = *(new CL_Angle(playerShip->displayHeading));
00055                         p->brain = playerShip->projectileBrain();
00056                         p->owner = playerShip;
00057                         ws->insertObject(p,playerShip->location.offsetPolar(playerShip->displayHeading,0));
00058                  }
00059                  timeLastFired = ws->time;
00060          }
00061 
00062 
00063 #ifdef ABSOLUTE_MOVEMENT
00064          if (keyboard->get_keycode(CL_KEY_UP))
00065          {
00066                  ws->moveObject(playerShip,playerShip->location.offsetRect(0,-10));
00067          }
